author: rgoldouz
body:
Hello,

I just applied @jpata 's comment on my previous PR,
https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/36889#issuecomment-1036209193

But I had to use the most recent CMSSW
CMSSW_12_3_X_2022-02-13-0000

Please let me know if you have any further comment.

Thanks,
Reza
title: electron mass set to zero - comments applied
